name: Easy Apple Bread Pudding
author: Elanor
summary: An easy-to-make and oh-so-yummy apple bread pudding. Perfect for dessert or just as an afternoon snack with coffee or tea. Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, whipped cream, or some powdered sugar on top, if desired.
ingredients: 2 medium apples - peeled, cored, and cubed
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place apples into a bowl and cover with hot water
Place bread cubes into a bowl and add remaining honey, milk, eggs, and vanilla extract
Take apples out of water and let excess drip off; add apples and cinnamon to the bread mixture and mix slowly
Pour mixture into the prepared dish
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown on top, 30 to 35 minutes
